Relevant code:
舊版 - <https://github.com/hackfoldr/hackfoldr/blob/master/app/app/controllers.ls#L261>
新版 - <https://github.com/hackfoldr/hackfoldr-2.0/blob/master/views/index.jade#L617> <- 一定要叫做「編輯註解」不然就給你空字串ㄛ >_o
